Sequence Information.Peptide Name: Mycobacterium phage peptide (33-47)[K2V, S6L, L10S, G12W, A13W, W14K], AK15-6

UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the part of the UniProt entry that may represent a peptide precursor.

Literature.Title: A small mycobacteriophage-derived peptide and its improved isomer restrict mycobacterial infection via dual mycobactericidal-immunoregulatory activities.
Literature.Author: Yang Y, Liu Z, He X, Yang J, Wu J, Yang H, Li M, Qian Q, Lai R, Xu W, Wei L

Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: Human erythrocytes:0% Hemolysis=<200 µg/ml,Rabbit erythrocytes:0% Hemolysis=<200 µg/ml,Murine peritoneal macrophages:0% Cytotoxicity=<200 µg/ml,Vero E6 cells:0% Cytotoxicity=<200 µg/ml
